Haverhill Library

Manager: Sanphra Willmott

Camps Road, Haverhill
CB9 8HB

Tel: 01440 702638
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Friends of Haverhill Library

Social media:

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Pinterest

Facilities

  • Free wifi available
  • Scanning, printing and photocopying facilities
  • Accessibility information

Room hire

Display space

Display space 1: Foyer (suitable for small table top / banner display)

  • Per day (manned): £5
  • Per week (unmanned): £20

Display space 2: in library (suitable for small table top / banner display)

  • Per day (manned): £5
  • Per week (unmanned): £20

Glass Display Cabinet: in library (suitable for exhibiting crafts, handmade goods, collections)

Per week (maximum 2 weeks): £7.50 per week

Large Display board: in library (suitable for exhibition displays, local project information, public notices)

Per week (maximum 2 weeks): £7.50 per week

Opening hours

Tuesday 0900 – 1900
Wednesday 0900 – 1300, 1600 – 1800
Thursday 0900 – 1900
Friday 0900 – 1700
Saturday 0900 – 1630
Sunday 1000 – 1600

Regular events and activities

Children's events

Baby Bounce: soothing songs and gentle nursery rhymes for babies, up to 18 months old

Friday, 1000-1030

Craft activities: for primary school age children

Sunday, 1030-1200

Tot Rock: songs and action rhymes for toddlers, from 18 months to pre-school age

Tuesday, 1000-1030

Older people's events

Top Time: events and activities for older people

Wednesday, 1030-1200

Reading groups

Page Turns reading group

third Saturday of the month, 1430-1600

Kids book club

third Sunday of the month, 1030-1130

Bookworms reading group

second Saturday of the month, 1430-1600

Writing groups

No writing group events.

Computer courses

Storytime: stories for pre-school children

Monday, 1000-1030

1:1 IT tutorials on PC or tablets: £5 for half an hour, £7.50 for up to an hour

Sessions arranged on a mutually convenient basis, N/a

Language courses

English as a Second Language chat group

second Sunday of the month, 1400-1530

Arts & crafts

No arts & crafts events.
